sentences: Jan Erik Vold (born 18 October 1939) is a Norwegian lyric poet, jazz vocal reciter, translator and author.
He has contributed greatly to the renewal of Norwegian poetry, and created interest in lyrical poetry.
Jan Erik Vold is currently living in Stockholm.
He was born in Oslo, the son of journalist Ragnar Vold.
